name: Lushy Hostels
address: Jl. Munduk Tengah Br. Pengembungan No.11B, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Staying at this hostel was an absolute delight! From the moment I arrived, the staff were incredibly welcoming and helpful, making me feel right at home. The atmosphere was vibrant and friendly, with plenty of opportunities to meet fellow travelers and exchange stories. The facilities were clean and well-maintained, and the communal areas were perfect for relaxing or socializing. Plus, the location couldn't have been better, with easy access to all the main attractions. I highly recommend this hostel to anyone looking for a fantastic and affordable accommodation option!
review 2: Highly recommend staying here! Staff are amazing and so friendly. Beds are a good size and you have plenty space and privacy. There‚Äôs lots of social events on for meeting people but you can also chill too. My favourite hostel in Bali can‚Äôt wait to come back. Live laugh lushy x
review 3:
This is such a lovely hostel! Initially booked for 2 days but ended up staying for 2 weeks ü§©

1. The staff is awesome! From the moment you walk in, they remember your name throught your stay.

2. The hostel is social. Plenty of chances to exchange stories. Pub Crawl is super fun. And this is coming from a shy guy üòó

3. Lovely pool.

4. Lovely rooftop area. Small but offers a fantastic view of the beach.

5. Best rooms ever: These are the best dorm beds I‚Äôve ever found. Period! Beds are huge, have separate stairs to climb which is super convenient, and super clean.

6. Clean toilets - 24/7

7. Great prices - There are offers certain days a week. Pizza day is one of my favourite. Also, Pub Crawl is reasonable for the value you get.

8. Scooty prices are fine but they can work on their condition.

9. Best in class Co-Working Space: The area is nice chilled glass space with really high speed stable wifi with an unobstructed view of the pool. Working from here was a dream üòç

Overall this was a dream hostel to stay. Loved my time here. Wish to visit again üòâ
review 4: A place full of many extroverted guests and staff members. They have different themes every day of the week so you always have something to do. The staff is so nice and welcoming, making you feel at home the moment you step through the door. Would recommend to every social person visiting Canggu
review 5: The best hostel I‚Äôve stayed at in Bali so far! Very chill vibe during the day and great events to make for social evenings. Even if you‚Äôre not interested in the social scene, the staff make sure the common areas are all quiet by 2300. What made for the best experience with this hostel was by far the staff.. they were very attentive and went above and beyond for everything you needed.

name: WOODS PERERENAN
address: Jl. Dalem Lingsir No.8, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
LOVE LOVE LOVE!! Visited twice during my week in the area. Once for Sunday brunch (such lovely jazz music), another with friends for dinner.

For brunch, I ordered the boneless chicken leg: this is absolutely delectable. I think in the moment I called it the best chicken I've ever eaten. It's seasoned so incredibly well, so juicy and soft - it had me cleaning the plate with the rest of my mash.

For dinner, we ordered a lot. The main thing I want to note is their accommodation with my friend's nut allergy. They were thoughtful of this even in their complimentary dish ‚ù§Ô∏è So lovely to have this peace of mind.

Main dishes ordered: Seafood Arborio Risotto, Grilled Fillet Barramundi, Duck Leg Confit (our favourite by far), Chicken a'La Vanille (a lil dry; granted, our server warned us lol)

Sharing: Kahf cheese (loved this)

Dessert: Passion Fruit Pavlova

Drinks: Blue Dream tea, Butterfly Pea Flower tea, The Roots (my personal favourite)
review 2: Excellent dining experience. Lovely atmosphere and  very attentive staff. The food is fantastic, especially for the price you pay. Very high quality, delicious and well presented. We both had the grilled Barramundi and passion fruit pavlova, The kitchen were happy to substitute an ingredient so I could avoid coriander which the wait staff were extremely helpful with. Highly recommend.
review 3: The food is amazing. They have delicious vegetarian options and also other healthy options. All the food that we ordered are good, but the best is the pumpkin risotto and fried truffle polenta. Hummus is just so so, the blend is too thick and less tasty. But the rest is amazing. Even the coffee is alsi good. Ambiance is nice, staff are friendly and they gave a free fried fish ball for free. Definitely will come back. Want to try the breakfast as well.
review 4:
We loved this place! The interior is absolutely stunning! Green oasis, so peaceful and quiet. Coffee is very good and we enjoyed eggs Benedict and healthy bowl for breakfast. Everything is so fresh! üòç
Staff is friendly and not boring. They are there when you need them. ü•∞
I could eat breakfast here every day. Keep up the great work. üòç
review 5: A perfect score of 5 out of 5! ‚ú® Their brunch and lunch menus are exquisitely prepared, offering a delightful selection whether you prefer a light bite or a hearty meal. The menu is simply delicious.

name: BAKED. Pererenan
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.118, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
types: bakery, brunch_restaurant, coffee_shop, cafe, breakfast_restaurant, restaurant, food, store
review 1:
I would recommend to come to Baked only for breakfast! üç≥ü•ñü•ê
The tomatoe toast was deliciousüçÖ, fresh and super tasty. ü§§
Best scramble was creamy and tasty too.
I am giving 4 stars because the matcha üçµ is the worst which I have ever had, coffee as well not the best!
review 2: Ordered the ice palm sugar latte and it‚Äôs amazing! If you don‚Äôt like your coffee too sweet, trick is not to shake all the palm sugar or just ask for less palm sugar. Went there around 2-3 PM where it‚Äôs super quiet. Love their spacious area. Their pastries are also good!
review 3: Flavors of BAKED are always consistent and for that I‚Äôm super happy. Food could have been served warmer, but the flavors were what I remember them to be and was consistently good. An absolutely reliable and solid hit for everytime I‚Äôm back in Bali‚ÄîI have to recommend the Benny and Jenny. Their sourdough is also pretty spot on.
review 4:
Come for coffee and breakfast.
Coffee taste just ok, brakfast menu is good.
Parking space for cars is very limited.
Menu is coffee, non coffee, pastries, sourdough bread, and some others.
Seating area is non aircon.
review 5:
My favorite Baked store is here, Pererenan. Outdoor vibes and a modern interior, catchy! also with very good food and beverage options! You just try the best Scramble, it‚Äôs quite famous and it just melts in your mouth along with the savory roe and the perfectly baked sourdough. It is also a good place to hang out to meet your friends just enjoy your brunch or maybe just grab some coffee after your pilates session. Their coffee is good too. Also if you're planning to chill and do your work, the ambience is pretty cool and there's plenty of space. For a coffee and croissant was around 100k, which is a reasonable price for a cafe. The staff were also excellent, attentive, and friendly to everyone. I‚Äôm always lucky cause I picked the right hour whenever I wanted Baked so I didn't wait long, some people had to wait outside since Baked is always crowded from breakfast to brunch. Clean and sweet and nice smells toilet also important. I will be back soon! Best of luck Baked Pererenan & Team
Love,
üê∞‚ô•Ô∏è‚òïÔ∏è

name: Touch√©
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.104, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
I like the place, sometimes it is too loud, place is near the road, so it is noise from bikes, also noise from construction near by, and music inside, so it is hard to talk with someone or concentrate.

There is no AC, but they have fans so it helps a little bit.

Service is good, food is tasty.
They bring bottle of water to every table.
Thanks for this small details:)
review 2:
I use to eat here many times,even place is small and sometimes u really have to wait for table and quiet hot(promise if they have AC definitely I will eat more and come 3times a day)
Stuff are nice and friendly. Before order u get free water refill. Price average but portions are huge. Food is tasty u can feel that ingredients are fresh. I am big fan of falafel bowl,and cauliflower ‚Äúchicken wings‚Äù, also ice coffe ‚Äúlove or lost‚Äù so refreshing. You can buy flowers here too. Nice place really)
review 3: While the cafe was bustling with activity, I couldn't help but notice the worn furnishings that detracted from the ambiance. Service was slower than expected, which was a bit of a letdown. However, the redeeming factor was the quality of the food and drinks, which were quite satisfying.
review 4:
Located in pererenan.
If you access by bike from pererenan shortcut, the cafe located not far from there.
The menu has option from sweet to savoury, with price range 60k to 100k.
Motorcycle parking available.
Taste was good and for breakfast, the portion was great.
review 5:
Big portion and delicious! Expensive tho. Coffee was very small. Nice place to sit in. Nice staff and free wi-fi. I had a smoked salmon salad.

-2 stars because I hate getting charged hidden fees

name: Mostly
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.114, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Absolutely delighted with the exquisiteness and presentation of the main dishes, drinks and desserts. Very friendly and pleasant staff treatment, and the place and atmosphere are so beautiful. Together with Zest Ubud, my 2 favorite restaurants in the whole island! I will return every time I visit Bali.
review 2:
Don‚Äôt let the unassuming entrance fool you.

It is the most beautifully restaurant I have been in Bali and I have been to quite a few impressive ones. The interior design gives the place a very organic and sexy vibe even during the daytime. Great ambiance and quiet that people work and have meeting throughout the day. Well, the airconned room is so nice and much needed on those hot days although the outdoor hanging garden area was looking phenomenal.

The food is good but at this point as long as the food is not bad we keep coming for the ambiance, drinks (full bar), and desserts. Their deserts are so impressive!!!!

The service is friendly and accommodating.
review 3: Quickly becoming one of my fave place in pererenan. Everything in the menu is good although they do not have extensive menu. The bbq cauliflower is delicious... the pho , pad thai, duck ramen, and the laksa all arw yummy. Then you definitely ahould not miss dessert. The  dark choclate in glasa is pretty and yummy. The hazelnut mouse also good.... and many other mouthwatering  cakes. The place it self is pretry.espwcially the back / garswn area and the tea room upstaies. Instagrammable.
review 4: Absolutely love Mostly Bali Pererenan! From their refreshing drinks to delectable desserts, every visit here is a delight. We have a mission to checklist every dessert they haveü§™ The ambiance is charming, and the design truly captures the essence of Bali style. Highly recommend for a fantastic dining experience!
review 5: Discovering this Asian bistro was like finding a hidden gem that effortlessly transitions from restaurant to cozy bar to dessert haven. The ambiance is vibrant yet relaxed, making it the perfect spot for any occasion. But what truly stole the show for me personally were the artful desserts on display ‚Äì each one a masterpiece both in taste and presentation (although yet to make my way through the lemon meringue and chocolate cake!). Whether you're in the mood for a full meal, a casual drink, or a sweet treat, this bistro ticks all the boxes. It's become my go-to spot for indulgence and relaxation all rolled into one delicious package.

name: Brunch Club Pererenan
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.110, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Yummy food. Good portion. Relatively fast service. Helpful and friendly staff. Clean toilets. Indoor with high ceiling and a tree. My favourite here is fried chicken waffle w/ maple syrup üßá better to come here 8am or after 1pm to avoid their busy hours
review 2: Tasty food and big portions are just the beginning here. The atmosphere was cozy and inviting, the service was excellent, and the prices were very reasonable.  I'll definitely be back, and I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a satisfying meal.
review 3:
Everything great! Unfortunately they are fixing the road so it is loud when they are using the machines. But apparently is only for a few more days.
Food is very tasty and the place is so beautiful
review 4: Beautiful cafe, with lovely staff, and delicious food. The waffle dish was very plain and it was missing some sort of cream on the side. I suggest ordering their porncakes to share since it's very sweet and consider other options as your main breakfast.
review 5: I like this places a lot!! They have amazing food, good flavor, good presentation, kind and friendly staff. My favorite waitress is Thesia ü•∞ She always remember what I want to order ahead of time was awesome with us. I recommend üíØ

name: Bar Vera Bistro & Wine Bar
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.84, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Had one of the best, if not the best dining experience in Bali. The food was 10/10 and the service was amazing. Special thanks to Farah, who made sure my experience was magical. Food is on the pricier side, but well worth it. Will be coming again!
review 2: I‚Äôm not exactly sure about Bar Vera. Given how much I was looking forward to dining here, i left with not bad, but lukewarm feelings. We ordered the sweet corn tartlet, beef ragu arancini, pig cheek croquettes, prawn and warm polenta, roasted chicken. All the starters were creative and quite an explosion of flavours in the mouth. However, the main dishes that were supposed to be the highlights paled in comparison due to taste and textures. Really did not enjoy the cocktail i ordered too, it tasted like a bad mojito. Service was good, staff was attentive. Design and ambience of the space were on point (especially Further hotel). Not sure about the fan blowing in my face‚Ä¶but overall, it still deserves 4 stars.
review 3:
Bar Vera emerges as a shining addition to the culinary scene in Parerenan, Bali. This establishment seamlessly blends Western (Australian-centric) cuisine with an enticing Asian flair, resulting in a menu that offers a delightful fusion of flavors.

The culinary offerings at Bar Vera are nothing short of impressive. From impeccable textures to precisely balanced temperatures and flavors, the dishes showcase a commitment to culinary excellence. The specials, in particular, stand out, presenting intriguing options that are undoubtedly worth exploring.

While the beverage selection is in ok level, I was surprise when they put corpse reviver cocktail on the menu, but turns out, they can‚Äôt make the real one but offers the other options to us.

However, it is evident that there is room for improvement in the service department. Staff training, especially in product knowledge, would greatly enhance the overall dining experience. A notable instance was when inquiring about ingredients aged for 12 months, receiving an inaccurate response regarding rice instead of the Comt√©.

In summary, Bar Vera delivers a delightful gastronomic experience with delicious offerings. While the service may benefit from refinement, the overall ambiance is undoubtedly inviting. A visit to Bar Vera promises a culinary journey that will leave patrons savoring the delightful fusion of flavors in a pleasant setting.
review 4: Everything on the menu is worth to try. We had the octopus, striploin, pommes and cabbage. Simple menus but they elevated on whole new level. The dessert banoffle souffle was theatrical and delicious. Definitely going back to try the pumpkin pie, shrimp and other menus. What a gem in pererenan!
review 5:
Loved the interior! The food was generally good, although the skewers were a tad salty.
But, delicious food nonetheless! I really enjoyed the potato bread :)

name: Honey,
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.132, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Bright light, good coffee, cozy spot. Had the well loved peach ricotta toast. Was a good breakfast dish‚Äîwhich makes sense given cheese + fruit + honey. The perfect morning sweet breakfast. Coffees were good too! Enjoyed the breakfast there thoroughly. Plugs are also available.
review 2: Honey in Pererenan is the bee's knees! üêù‚òïÔ∏è Not only did the coffee and food quality exceed expectations, but they also sweetened our day with their delicious offerings. Highly recommend stopping by for a buzz-worthy experience! Five stars all the way! Can‚Äôt wait to comeback üòÅ‚ù§Ô∏è
review 3: One of my favourite places to eat in Canggu, I‚Äôve dined here a fair few times and never been disappointed. The venue itself is lovely as are the staff. Food is very reasonable price and delicious. Highly recommend the peach ricotta toast, overnight oats and any smoothie bowl!
review 4:
One of my favorite cute places around Pererenan! Staff were friendly, and the food and atmosphere are top-notch. Lovely place for work from cafe, for good brunch or just having a nice cup of coffee with friends.
The store's interior is stylish and modern, with a clean, minimalist design that makes it easy to navigate. Honey is quite famous, so be ready if you don‚Äôt get a table during busy hours especially Brunch time, although it‚Äôs busy but food serving time is fair and the staffs are attentive.
I love the food, smoothie bowl and the coffee, I‚Äôll keep coming back for more Honey goods!
Best of luck for Honey, and Team
Love, üê∞‚ô•Ô∏è‚òïÔ∏è
review 5:
Quite popular place and had some cozy chill vibes. U can choose areas:outside or AC which is great.
Food is good,but portions not so big,if we compare with other place. But the quality of food is good, service fast and friendly. So I had a good experience here couple of times

name: The Bali Dream Villa & Resort Echo Beach Canggu
address: Jl. Dalem Lingsir Br. Pengembungan, Pererenan, Echo Beach, Canggu, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Had a blast staying with my family at their private pool villa. Upon entering the lobby, we received great service from their security and front office staff. Helpful bellboy patiently waiting for us who brings a lot of bags and the bellboy carried most of it by hand!

The villa room (room number 402) is lovely and clean and the pool is also well maintained. Their AC is working really well. The only downside was their hot water is not working and I guess they have begun construction next door which is very loud in the afternoon.

The area is quiet, perfect for those who wants to get away from the bustling main street of Canggu. But, they have a limited parking space for cars (maximum two or three cars).

Their breakfast buffet option is limited but taste wonderful. Room service menu is (surprisingly) very affordable for Canggu area but have limited option.

Staff is friendly and helpful!

Will book again if I ever stayed in Canggu.
review 2: The Bali Dream Villa offers a comfortable stay with standard amenities. While not overly luxurious, the rooms are clean and well-maintained. The staff is generally friendly and helpful, though service can be inconsistent. The hotel's location is convenient for travelers, but the dining options may lack variety. Overall, it provides decent accommodation for a reasonable price.
review 3:
I do not recommend this resort at all.what is advertised is not what you get.The Ac In my room wasn‚Äôt working well enough ,at night I‚Äôd get so hot and restless.it was so hot a bottle of water would have bubbles in the morning and the ac was running all night.The shower had no pressure at all and when asked they said all the rooms are the same.One morning I woke
Up and there was no running water.i had to wait half an hour for the water to come back.the lift  broke down at some
Point so you had to use the stairs.
Breakfast menu 4/10.if you have any early activities you will miss out on breakfast.
I had to ring the restaurant multiple days to ask for clean glasses as they forgot when the room was cleaned.No balcony or windows.there is construction nearby that gets really noisy.
It was an unpleasant stay and would not recommend staying here.
review 4:
Pleasant hotel, but unfortunately not worth the money.

Pros
- The rooms are clean, comfortable, spacious
- Friendly staff
- Very quiet and peaceful. Amazing escape from all the noise in Canggu

Cons
- Wifi not accessible from rooms and mobile data reception was poor, which was really disruptive
- Staff forgot to clean our room
- Bathroom needs maintenance, appliances are old and some don‚Äôt work well
- Not worth the money. Having paid 1.4 mill / USD100, I expect the basics like wifi & cleaning to be smooth
review 5:
Great rooms where we booked a Bedroom Pool villa. Location seems a bit interior where you don't have many shops nearby but have great privacy and silence.

If you want to have a luxury and a private stay without any pubs or shopping stuff around then this is the best place to choose.

name: Red Gunpowder
address: Jl. Munduk Tengah No.6, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: BEST INDIAN RESTAURANT IN THE AREA‚ù§Ô∏è Me and my partner had the best experience here. I want to say a huge thank you to the chef, chris. He made my day. He‚Äôs the most patient, caring and just nice person you can meet. We had some vegan dishes and I wish I could give 10 stars, I‚Äôm really impressed by the quality of the ingredients and the way they‚Äôve been cooked and served. Thank you to all the team of red gunpowder, I highly recommend this place. I hope I can come back soon. Chris if you read this review you are the best chef on the planet üôèüèΩ
review 2: Wow! The atmosphere was amazing and unique. Loved the decor and candlelight. The food was also amazing and some of the best Indian cuisine we have tried. Even the rice was notably excellent. Numerous helpful staff. Prices were also fair.
review 3:
If you are looking to pay too much for fancy Indian while barely being able to see your dish...this is it!

The food is good, quality ingredients, octopus was juice but very sweet. Rogan Josh was alright but also very sweet.

Overall portions where small and taste modernized Indian.

Great cocktails though!
review 4:
Food was fantastic, yes a bit on the expensive side but it‚Äôs not a regular Indian restaurant. The atmosphere is very good, the staff is super friendly. We asked about the spiciness of the most spicy dish, and the server suggested that we try it and brought out a sample of the sauce to taste. He really helped us pick our food and the cocktails were amazing.

i dont understand why this place is not as popular as all the ones you see on Insta all the time.

The speakeasy bar next door is great too!
review 5:
An Indian restaurant that boasts a well-deserved high rating, is an absolute gem for those who appreciate the fusion of delectable flavors and captivating settings.
The restaurant's beautiful setting adds an extra layer of charm to the ambiance. The atmosphere is a delightful blend of elegance and comfort, creating the perfect backdrop for a memorable meal. It's evident that Red Gunpowder understands that dining isn't just about food; it's about creating an immersive experience.
Now, let's talk about the main event ‚Äì the curries. I don't say this lightly, but the curries are quite possibly some of the best I've had in a while. Whether you're a fan of fiery heat or prefer milder flavors, there's something on the menu to suit every palate.
In addition to the fantastic food, is the service. The staff is exceptionally friendly and remarkably efficient.
In sum, I wholeheartedly recommend Red Gunpowder to anyone seeking a remarkable Indian culinary adventure.

name: Further Hotel
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.84, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Stayed here for a night and we loved it. Everything was perfect honestly. The suite is designed beautifully and the ambience delivers such a relaxing mood. We had a good fun and also a energizing rest here. But what ties everything together is the service! Everyone was so accomodating and helpful! Would definitely check this hotel out next time I‚Äôm in Bali.
review 2:
Everything about this hotel is pure art. From its architecture, interior details to small details to your room ‚Äî everything is well curated. It‚Äôs like a storytelling, from paintings and coffee table books, it has something that will resonate to you.

Location wise is very good, Bar Vera is another experience. ‚ú®
review 3: The hotel is super cool, the interior design and products they provided are amazingly harmony with the room. I love the photography art pieces they displayed, and the concept of whole hotel is artistically unique! Moreover, the service is super welcoming, Ingrid and Michelle is so kind and generous, especially offering me a lovely birthday cake while knowing the trip is during my birthday, so sweet!!!
review 4: Absolutely love this concept. The service was amazing, and they have really great recommendations on the food and coffee. I love that the surroundings are quaint, and not overly crowded. The buggy service and collaborations they have are really very helpful. Definitely worth staying here!
review 5:
Further is a Magic space. The immediate peace that hits you once you step inside is something unique. The team is incredible as well! Most importantly the room light show just before sunset is one of the most magical moments possible!

It's honestly hard to leave the room and get over it.

name: The Shady Fox
address: Jl. Tukad Pingai, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
This bar is a great place to go for a drink with friends. The atmosphere is fun and lavish with reasonable price. The staff is friendly and attentive, and they are helpful to suggest recommendations. Would definitely recommend this speak easy bar to anyone who are looking for a fun and affordable night out!

Here are some specific details about the bar that I enjoyed:

‚Ä¢ The location is convenient.
‚Ä¢ The decor is modern and stylish.
‚Ä¢ The drinks are well-made.
‚Ä¢ The staff is friendly and welcoming.

Overall, I had a good time at this bar. I would definitely go back again.
review 2: Amazing cocktails (try the Tom yum gin one - especially good).. great service and an amazing live jazz quartet. This place is a great vibe.
review 3:
Speak easy bar. Very well the hospitality and nice creation of cocktails.
Very recommended. We'll back again soon!
review 4: The Shady Fox is an incredible hidden gem that pleasantly surprised us. Their cocktails were the best we've ever had, and despite it being our first visit, the atmosphere was fantastic. The karaoke added to the fun, and the staff were exceptionally friendly, making our experience even more enjoyable. We can't wait to return to this cozy and delightful place! Look for Tama when you‚Äôre here! :)
review 5: superb service here. great servers and drinks at reasonable prices. have a live band as well where you can vape/smoke. great atmosphere which reminds me of a bespoke bar. gud to spend a chill night in bali with quality drinks and ambience

name: Roots
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.121, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: I love this place! Always fresh ingredients, the salads are incredibly delicious, my favourite is the Ancient bowl and I like building my own bowl here! Matcha latte is just as delicious! I definitely recommend this place for lunch or dinner! There is a nice atmosphere, good service and great foodü§ç
review 2: Highly recommended. One of the best, if not the best, vegan place I have eaten in Bali. The restaurant is beautiful, the staff is very friendly and attentive and the Food is sublime and very well presented. All fresh and tasty  10/10 I loved my experience with them and would repeat in fact I went for lunch and the next day for breakfast.
review 3: My plant power big breakfast was amazing! It is a bit more on the expensive side (215k for brekkie, tea and mineral water) but definitely worth it. Not only because the food is very high standard, the atmosphere is nice and the staff incredibly kind and hospitable. Def worth a detour if you are in the area!
review 4: So many vegan options! Super yummy. I went for dinner with my boyfriend. We had the curry with flatbread to share and then carrot as a side, the sandwich and rice cake. For dessert apple and coconut. Peaceful atmosphere, friendly service. Recommend it!
review 5: Perfect place to kick off our holiday. Food is delicious and fresh. I tried the watermelon ‚Äútuna‚Äù poke bowl and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. The flat bread and dips was also a hit. Staff were super friendly and attentive. The venue itself is striking. Would definitely return :)

name: Pescado Bali
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.112, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: Pescado in Pererenan is a hidden gem! Their paella is delicious, but you can't go wrong with the garlic shrimp and bread - my personal favorite. Their 50k sangrias promo on Thursday are a steal. The interior is cozy making it a perfect spot for a chill dinner with loved ones. Will definitely come back
review 2:
Being a huge Spanish food fan, I was practically bouncing with excitement when I stumbled upon Pescado the other day.  Let me tell you, it did NOT disappoint! Each dish was a revelation! We ordered a selection of tapas to share, and every single one was bursting with flavor.

And to top it all off, they even surprised us with a free drink!  That little touch of generosity just added to the overall positive experience.

Lets fiestaaaa!
review 3:
I like üá™üá∏ food now after a visit to Pescado. I was expecting to have more of the burnt crust in the paella but they served a perfectly amount of it. I like burnt rice in üáÆüá© dishes too, I guess it‚Äôs universal haha.

The tuna tataki also great! Fish is fresh and the mashed potato is creamy. Will definitely visit again.
review 4:
If you want to try paella and if you love seafood, you should visit Pescado in pererenan! I tried the croquettes, garlic prawns and cheesecake, which were all delicious.

They also have sangria promo on Thursdays for only 50k IDR.
review 5: The paella is the best at this Spanish restaurant in Bali. Every single tapas dish is also delicious. In addition, the staff are all incredibly friendly!

name: Wasabi Hotel and Restaurant
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
types: japanese_restaurant, hotel, sushi_restaurant, lodging, restaurant, food
review 1:
PLUS:
The rooms are nice with a taste of "Nature" style with a spacious balcony.

The price is also affordable for everyone.

There is a nice "Infinity Pool" outside next to the bar.

MINUS:
The AC was very loud, at any speed and at night I had to turn it off because of that.

The location is not so "wow",so don't expect that everything is near you.
review 2:
Amazing and friendly staff, comfortable rooms, the restaurant has the best fried rice, room service every day, little complimentary items when down by the pool provided by the wonderful staff, location is perfect and very close to delicious restaurants, fantastic shops and convenience stores.

The only small negative is it was very noisy at night, but this could have been the time of year we stayed (New Years Eve). Lots of other guests slamming their doors in the middle of the night - the front door to the rooms aren't soundproof.
review 3: Excellent hotel 5 min walk to beach and close to some amazing restaurants. Staff were incredibly friendly and helpful breakfast was nice and pool temperature just right. The rooms were cozy and clean.Having room on 2nd floor provided us with small fully shaded balcony with comfortable bed/sofa to relax in full privacy.
review 4:
We are very enjoyed.
We had all you can eat promotion with 125++ but is so yummy .
With a good japanese food, small pool but so clean.
Staff was wonderfull, i have 5 start for this place, will happy to be here .

Will come back for food promotion .
review 5: I spent 8 days in this friendly Hotel and my experience was simply perfect. The location is perfect and food, staff, cleaness, price were really amazing. I met families, surfers, couples and solo travellers like me and I got from them the same excellent opinion. I will come back for sure i my next visit. Thank you Wasabi! Love Wasabi!! Paolo

name: HOME by Chef Wayan
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.92, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Home by Chef Wayan serves meals that are as beautiful as they are delicious. My dish was an artful symphony of traditional Balinese flavors with a touch of modern innovation. The tender, perfectly cooked meat was complemented by a rich, savory sauce.  A vibrant salad brought freshness, while zesty lime added the perfect touch of brightness. Even the side vegetables were expertly prepared, showcasing their natural sweetness with a hint of enticing smokiness.  If you want to experience the essence of Balinese cuisine, a meal at Home by Chef Wayan is an absolute must.
review 2:
What a gem! We found Home after finding that the chef was behind the food we had eaten on a live aboard boat. So for our last night in Bali we had to try it out.
It‚Äôs definitely off the main drag of Canggu and well worth jumping in a Grab to eat here.
Simply furnished with outdoor and indoor seating you could feel the love from the first step.
The food is a modern take on Indonesian whilst keeping with the delicious fresh tastes we love.
We enjoyed so many dishes it‚Äôs hard to choose a favourite but it must be said it‚Äôs the best rendang we have had! The duck breast was so so tender, the sates had been properly grilled with a house made sauce.
The sambals are all made freshly which really adds to the flavours.
There is an extensive cocktail list and they too are well made and delicious
Do yourself a favour and come here you won‚Äôt regret it! .
review 3:
This restaurant wins my ‚ÄòFavourite Food‚Äô Award in Bali during the last 6 weeks of travel! I tried the Tempe Bakar and Holy Moley it was OUTSTANDING (even came back to have it again haha) and on my second visit was lucky enough to meet Chef Wayan himself, what a lovely lovely human!

The Black Rice Pudding is an absolute MUST as well!

Don‚Äôt miss a visit to this absolute gem in Pererenan. üôå
review 4:
Had dinner her with my fiance and it didn't disappoint. The atmosphere is nice even though the place is outdoor the staff is very friendly and helpfull. All the mains here come with rice but we decided to not take the rice and they were kindly enough to offer us to change the rice with sautee vegetable.
The grilled octopus we had a little bit overcooked and the sambal can be too spicy for some people, the ledok nusa is out of this world. The creaminess of the potato and coconut milk balanced by the punch from the sambal and bawang goreng, this is my first time trying ledok nusa and what a introduction it is.
review 5: So cozy and delicious food! Thank you to the lovely staff who made me feel like HOME. Got to have dinner with a book full of photos of Bali, enjoyed a very tasty and warm meal. I almost end up having dinner at a very fancy restaurant nearby but I knew I wanted something that felt like it was made with love and intention. And it was! Thank you!!

name: LA RESERVE 1785 CANGGU BEACH
address: Jalan Munduk Kedungu No.19 Pererenan, Canggu, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
types: resort_hotel, wedding_venue, hotel, spa, lodging, event_venue, restaurant, food
review 1: This is an exceptional venue from end to end. A beautiful haven of tranquility and peace in the bustling Canggu area, that will make you feel at home. The staff‚Äôs kindness is only exceeded by their professionalism. The hotel and rooms are perfectly decorated, blending local architecture/design with tasteful, understated luxury, and the right touch of quirkiness. While the surroundings offer an incredible selection of restaurants and coffee shops, to which the staff will kindly drive you with their buggy, one could just stay at La Reserve, as the food and drinks are excellent. We cannot recommend La Reserve strongly enough and we will certainly be back!
review 2:
Excellent boutique hotel,
The room is amazing. We had the villa with private pool, and filled with a lot of details, nice furniture, and well equipped, with its own personality. Access to the private pool from the room and shower area to give you full privacy and offers to have a dip whenever you feel like.
Staff are excellent, always helpful and doing all extra steps to make your stay as smooth and as amazing as possible. Arranging the spa booking, recommending restaurants around, and dropping us to the nearby beach.
Spa was really good and manage to go back few times during our stay.
Restaurant is amazing and the dish from the breakfast menu was beyond our expectation.  Nicely platted, and generous

With limited rooms, you won‚Äôt feel staying in a crowded place, and feel like on paradise

Overall it was an excellent experience, and the best place to relax. We would come back again
review 3: This is one of the great places to stay. The decor is stunning. The attention to detail flawless. The staff super-attentive without ever being over-bearing. And, when you do leave to go out locally, the golf cart whisks you anywhere you desire and picks you up. This really is what clever indulgence feels like.
review 4:
Absolutely Fabulous on all levels.  The hotel is like a sanctuary with limited rooms, beautiful gardens, reception and dining spaces all exquisitely designed and decorated with unique and stunning furnishings.  The incredible staff go above and beyond to make your stay a standout and special experience.
The Rooms are amazing - we had the private pool pavilion rooms which was wonderful and so well appointed with everything you could need during your stay - soft fluffy towels and and soft comfy bed linens ....
The Food was delicious- the breakfasts are an occasion with many options to choose from, fresh fruits,  juices and pastries are all so beautifully presented and tasty.
We will definitely be back as we have only been home a week and I wish I was back there :).
review 5: We‚Äôve been to Bali around 5 times, and this was definitely one of the best we‚Äôve ever experienced. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They offer free buggy pick ups that take you to restaurants and places nearby, which is really convenient for tourists like us. The breakfast is French style and delicious. The villa has a retro-French vibe, which is very beautiful and stands out from the other resorts. We also love the small pool in the villa, it‚Äôs clean and private. Would highly recommend to couples or friends who are looking for an exquisite experience in Canggu.

name: ST. ALi - Bali
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
types: cafe, brunch_restaurant, coffee_shop, bar, restaurant, food, store
review 1:
Tucked away in the burgeoning area of Pererenan, ST. ALi has landed all the way from Australia, bringing with it a blend of coffee culture and brunch delights. The surroundings are still deep in the throes of construction, so visitors should brace themselves for a bit of noise and dust from the ongoing developments on either side and across the street. Parking can also be a bit of a headache, so plan accordingly.

Upon arrival, the sleek and aesthetically pleasing exterior of ST. ALi is sure to catch your eye, although it may not immediately evoke the traditional Balinese vibe. Instead, it stands out with its modern charm and inviting facade.

Inside, the cafe was buzzing with activity, a testament to its newfound popularity. The design is a delightful fusion of Japanese minimalism and retro rustic elements, creating a cozy yet chic atmosphere perfect for a leisurely brunch or a quick coffee break.

Speaking of coffee, this is where expectations might need a slight adjustment. Despite the buzz surrounding its opening, the coffee here didn't quite hit the mark for me‚Äîit leaned a bit on the weaker side. However, the food more than made up for it. The Ali Smash has quickly become a favorite, offering a delectable mix of flavors that left a lasting impression.

The menu offers more than just coffee, with a range of cocktails and full brunch options that cater to different tastes. It's clear that ST. ALi is more than just a coffee shop; it's a vibrant spot for socializing and enjoying a hearty meal.

While it‚Äôs currently bustling with curious patrons and the atmosphere is lively, ST. ALi is a solid option for those in the neighborhood. Whether you‚Äôre in for a quick coffee or a full brunch experience, it‚Äôs a place worth checking out amidst the evolving landscape of Pererenan.
review 2: Here around 4PM and it was nice, no queue. Wanted a cup of coffee after meal, and got a cup of latte. The coffee is weaker compared to what I had in Oz, but it‚Äôs still smooth and okay. The staff was nice and accommodating. Pet friendly, so you can bring your dogs! üêï parking is available for bikes.
review 3:
New kid on the block by the people behind further hotel, bringing the famous Australian cafe to Bali‚Äôs shore.

The same delicious coffee can be found here along with their merch, coffee capsules, beans and more.

Fries were absolutely delicious!!
review 4:
I was so excited to visit here, but when I got my food that I ordered, I was disappointed.
The coffee was so weak, even though I ordered a size up.(So I thought I had only ordered one shot. Even though the price is same to the cafe in AU!!) But okay, that's fine.
But the food made me so disappointed. I don‚Äôt know how to cook the meat like this... I tried to eat it but I couldn‚Äôt. Even the pancakes were not good as well... that‚Äôs the first time I gave up on eating my pancakes.

Sorry to say that I was disappointed. Usually, I don‚Äôt write bad reviews for businesses, but I hope that my review will help your business improve.
review 5: It's one of Bali's most beautiful cafes in my opinion. The place is amazing, the architecture is totally trendy and instagram focused, and the branding is great. The drink and the food were really good as well. Glad to comeback here for next holiday.

name: Peels Records & Bar Bali
address: Jl. Pantai Pererenan No.70p, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: love this place! super friendly crew, great soundsystem and djs playing. didn‚Äôt try the food (no vegan options sadly) but drinks were yum
review 2: The interior of this bar is beautiful - literally like from Clockwork Orange movie set. It‚Äôs more pricey than a normal cocktail bar in Canggu but drinks we got were very authentic and tasty. Definitely recommend trying some of their signatures. Great music, smoking friendly and they also have cool magazines, zines and publications.
review 3: It's a very nice intimate bar but I don't really enjoy staying long there... great cocktails and cute decor! Worth to try :)
review 4: The best listening bar/club in Bali! Perfect atmosphere, amazing cocktails and the grooviest tunes. Everything top notch as it is supposed to be! Let‚Äôs not forget the host Bintang who takes the best care as well! Greetings from AmsterdamüôåüèΩ
review 5: Great listening space and bar. Provide good cocktails, price slightly higher than average bar especially in Bali

name: Canggu yoga centre
address: Banjar Pengembungan, Jl. Dalem Penataran No.8, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
types: fitness_center, cafe, gym, sports_complex, food, health
review 1: A nice yoga studio in Pererenan. They have many selection of yoga and exercise classes to choose. The studio is very clean and nice. The cafe on the ground floor has a beautiful design and relaxing ambience.
review 2:
Absolutely in love with the studio. It‚Äôs beautiful, green, and very very pleasant. Also offers hot yoga and Pilates which I‚Äôve never seen in Bali. In love with the challenges, pushing my body and mind to the limit and finding myself stronger and better after each and every class. I cannot recommend the studio enough.

Also tried the Build-Your-Own Salad Bowl. Super fresh with awesome taste. Absolute bliss after a morning workout ‚ô•Ô∏è
review 3:
Brand New, Modern design studio in Pererenan, outskirts of main section of Canggu. Because it's newly built it's Super clean including yoga mats and equipment.

Enjoyed the hot yoga(bikram), hot yoga sculpt and hot plates classes especially because I'm detoxing from city work life. Did a few back to back classes and then fueled up with green juices and salads for a few bucks

This is what Bali is meant to be.

Yoga pass can also be used at their sister studio Ubud Yoga Centre.
review 4:
Not just an ordinary Yoga Centre!!!
If you guys in Bali and a Yoga Lovers or Beginners, you must visit this place!

Yoga classes are on the 2nd and 3rd floors. They have spacious classrooms and well-equipped facilities with beautiful views üåÑ
The 1st floor is a cafe that sells healthy foods such as smoothies and juices. There's also coffee and other food.
The 2nd floor is Hot Yoga Class, like Bikram, HIIT Inferno, and others.
The 3rd floor is for Non Hot Yoga Class üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è, such as Kundalini and Pranayama Meditation, Intro to Ashtanga, Yin Yoga, etc.

The teachers are great and very experienced. The staffs also very welcoming. Here, you can enjoy yoga and beautiful views at the same time ^_^
Very recommended ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
review 5: I liked Ubud yoga center so I was really happy to see they set up another location in pererenan. The place is great. The yoga is great and only place that I know offers hot yoga.  But I‚Äôve recently learned to really enjoy the high internist training in a hot room.  It‚Äôs intense and a great workout.  I originally came for bikrim hot yoga but found HIT to be addictive.  Also took vinyasa classes and found them to be outstanding.  So this is my new favorite yoga place in the canggu area. I will say it is outstanding and you will have discovered a gem if you came to try it.  Look for me the sweaty old dude!!!!
